items.sentence: Tom thinks Mary is the most beautiful girl in his class.
Tom told me that he never wanted to work for his father.
Have you ever asked Tom why he doesn\'t like doing that?
What\'re the chances that Tom will actually get the job?
Tom and Mary went for a walk even though it was raining.
Tom and Mary were already eating dinner when I got home.
Tom and Mary were invited, so they felt obligated to go.
Tom and Mary were sitting at the kitchen table, talking.
Tom and his friends love to get together and play music.
Tom and his sister are both students at this university.
